name: Clement, Pope of Rome, and Peter, Bishop of Alexandria
troparia: (Tone 4) God of our fathers, You always treat us fairly.* Deprive us not of Your mercy,* but by their prayers direct our lives in peace.
kontakia: (Tone 8) As teachers of virtue and the adornment of hierarchs,* the church sings your praises:* By your prayers grant to those who venerate you with love* the achievement of virtues and deliverance from temptations,* for you are invincible.
